title: WTB: OJs Des Moines, Sioux City, Burlington
author: chlankf

posts.post_title: WTB: OJs Des Moines, Sioux City, Burlington
posts.post_content:
Evening everyone.  So tonight I went through my Iowa OJs.  I now have over 30 players/poses from DM & SC, no Burlington.  Eagerly seeking any DM or SC players or poses I'm missing.  Really hoping someone busts out Nyce from Burlington but happy to add any I need.  N172 or N173s.

Thanks Craig
Craig: Good luck finding the Nyce team variation. It is only known on one of his poses and is thus very scarce.
Jay.  It is #1 on my watchlist if one ever comes available.  When I posted this I figured Joe would, once again, post a picture of one to tease me.
My copy is in the Old Judge book.

Hello Craig,

I picked up my copy nearly 10 years ago, shortly after I moved to Iowa.  At the time I thought about collecting all the Iowa players/poses but quickly realized it would be tough to find all the 1888 Des Moines cards so I've peeled that back to just a singular copy of each of the three teams.

Jay's copy of this card is very nice, good contrast.  My copy is a little bit lighter.  Pretty rare to see Burlington cards of Nyce surface but there are others out there.  Keep up the search, I like your chances of eventually being rewarded :)
